name: Dice Dice Revolution (NebulaCollectif, Herve Gengler, Maxime Piquot, brknhrt16, GenglerCorentin, Sirhaian, KiruB)
name_original: Dice Dice Revolution (NebulaCollectif, Herve Gengler, Maxime Piquot, brknhrt16, GenglerCorentin, Sirhaian, KiruB)
description:
Hi!

We make this game in 50 hours for the GMTK 2022 game jam but completely forgot to submit it as an entry for the Jam. It's a real bummer, but we're super proud of this game and would love you to try it and tell us what you think of it! 

All the assets (art, anim, sound, code) were done during the Jam by our team.

Credits: 

Animation: ZombieCookie

Art: Amphytrion, Sirhaian, Yann Demange

Design & Prod: Herve Gengler

Programming: GenglerCorentin, Khevna Shah, kirub, Maxime Piquot

Sound Design: OreWaKoji

Special thanks to Iroh, the cat, for being a great purr programewr!
